answerText: Vlasov equation[10] The Vlasov equation is more commonly used to model this fourth state of matter, where one can observe Langmuir oscillations in the presence of weak electromagnetic fields.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Minnesota A and Dartmouth A and South Detroit University | 9 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Substituting the Lorentz force into the Liouville equation gives the relativistic form of this equation. For 10 points each:  [10] Identify this equation that is used to model the collisionless flow of particles in an electromagnetic field. It can be considered as a special case of the Boltzmann equation, and is also used to model beams of particles.
